references.paper_title: Are we ready for autonomous driving? The KITTI vision benchmark suite.
references.reason: This paper introduces the KITTI dataset, a widely used benchmark for autonomous driving research, which is re-annotated in this paper to create the TOI dataset.

references.paper_title: nuScenes: A multimodal dataset for autonomous driving.
references.reason: This paper introduces the nuScenes dataset, another large-scale dataset used for autonomous driving research; its characteristics are compared to the TOI dataset in the paper.

references.paper_title: Are all objects equal? Deep spatio-temporal importance prediction in driving videos.
references.reason: This paper is the first to propose the task of on-road object importance estimation and provides a small-scale dataset for the task; the proposed model in this paper improves upon the methods proposed in this paper.

references.paper_title: Goal-oriented object importance estimation in on-road driving videos.
references.reason: This paper proposes a model which this paper's model improves upon; the proposed model in this paper is compared against this work.

references.paper_title: Important object identification with semi-supervised learning for autonomous driving.
references.reason: This paper proposes a method for on-road object importance estimation which is compared with the proposed method in this paper
